segments.text: I notice the boy reaching for the cookie jar, and I’m surprised he hasn’t fallen yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is so unstable, and he’s stretching so far—it’s a miracle he’s still standing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is watching him, waiting for her share, and she doesn’t seem worried at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they do this often, sneaking cookies while the woman is distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on her dish that she doesn’t even notice them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m amazed at how oblivious she is to everything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pouring over the sink, and she’s just standing there like it’s normal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe no one has turned off the faucet yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is so unexpected and chaotic that I don’t even know what to think.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I’m watching something that shouldn’t be happening, but it is.
segments.speaker: PAR
